summary: This document is a brief email exchange from November 29, 2018, forwarding links to an article about Jeffrey Epstein and a related non-prosecution agreement document. It appears to be internal communication sharing media coverage and legal documents related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Acosta
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of a forwarded document link titled 'Acosta-Epstein', likely referring to Alexander Acosta who was involved in the 2008 plea deal.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the email exchange, with links provided to an article and a non-prosecution agreement document related to him.

connections.description: Acosta is associated with Epstein through a non-prosecution agreement document referenced in the email.

events.title: Email exchange about Epstein case
events.description: An email was sent forwarding links to a Miami Herald article and a non-prosecution agreement document related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: An email exchange on November 29, 2018, shared links to Epstein-related media and legal documents.
The email references a Miami Herald article about Jeffrey Epstein.
The email includes a link to a document titled 'Acosta-Epstein', likely related to the 2008 non-prosecution agreement.
